div.div: One important area to understand our role in our society and being able to live in harmony with others is the sense of responsability toward our community. In order to give them the opportunity of social integration and responsability, we should make the children involved with the daily tasks as a way of teaching the sense of responsibility and social obligations. These tasks are intended to make the children feel part of a big family by being willing to improve their conditions and the place. Responsibilities include cleaning and taking care of their younger sister and brothers.
